author: Simran Dhawan
text: I’m tired is my go to state.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Some days, we talk. But mostly, we share memes.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I’m not myself all this time and they couldn’t notice once.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: What is love if not sacrificing of oneself?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: What to do with all the unfulfilled needs?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Is it just me or every time you receive a ‘let me call you’ text, you put your phone on airplane mode?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: People who watch me cross the road must think I’m suicidal

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Somedays i get up with “enough of this sad shit” attitude but get tired by noon and give in.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I don’t know what to do with all the time I have.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I find people I like. Love them. Become them. But who was I before them?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Can’t wait to do a little fashion show for him every time i buy new clothes

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I’m not well and getting not attention. Remind me again, what are the perks of having a boyfriend!? Because I can’t remember shit.🤧

author: Simran Dhawan
text: The day I’ll be able to drink by myself, it’s over for no one but me only.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: What is this hopeless resentment towards my own?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I watch myself fall apart daily only to look at it silently.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Failing miserably

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Trying hard to not act how I feel.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I atleast need 11-12 hours of sleep to function humanly. Idk who decided on 8 hours?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Food, sex, attention are no more filling this void.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I swear you guys are not ready to see the face I be making under the damn mask.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Living is unacceptable. Why do we have to keep on doing this?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I wanna get drunk and travel in metro only to judge every damn human present there.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I’m all ears about what happened with you just don’t ask about me. I’ll cry

author: Simran Dhawan
text: The sun rising, birds chirping didn’t feel soothing. What in world is wrong with me?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: What if you’re not able to find yourself because there’s nothing worth finding?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Some people accept the world in every condition. Never questioning. Never enquiring.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Homosexuality se dikkat nahi hai. Also, mera beta GAY nahi hoskta- Indians accepting homosexuality.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Obsessed with me but in a ‘I hate myself but I know my worth’ way.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: You are not forgotten.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Whenever my mind is sad, angry, hurt, it starts to clean. I mean, wow, thanks for being helpful even at your worst.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Death is freedom till the time it doesn’t touch known. Then it’s destruction.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Do you ever just miss their touch? Or is it just me?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: You should go for wal..fflee😩🧇

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Sometimes all you gotta say is OKAY and let it go.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: He cheated me in dream. Me mad at him in reality. Like how dare you?

author: Simran Dhawan
text:
My manager- where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Me- I don’t wanna see myself in next 5 years. Please stop!

author: Simran Dhawan
text: The “I will burn the world if you’re feeling cold” kind of love is top tier. Everything else is just an ordinary lie.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Practical love? Obsessive love?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Zero tolerance. Strict boundaries. Ultimate self love. I’m good at none of these but you should be.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Boyfriends make you fat. Period.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Loving him is my way of saving me from myself.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I’m a different person on every application and I’m not a person in real life.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Is sadness way too comforting or am I just depressed?

author: Simran Dhawan
text: For I know, I will find my home in the city of abandon

author: Simran Dhawan
text: I DRINK VODKA TO HAVE THE URGE TO DRINK WATER.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Not me reading my notes and feeling cringe.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: “I’m 1000% sure”to “we will see” real quick.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: If given an opportunity, my cat would remove my vocal chords because of all the times she has to listen to my ugly voice and wrong lyrics.

author: Simran Dhawan
text: Oh to have responsibilities when you’re actually disassociated with the reality🤧😩

author: Simran Dhawan
text: How do I tell people that I might not be a pushover and the only reason I agree to what they wanna do is because idgaf. Life doesn’t interest me no more.
